articles.description: After bombing a match winning try against Penrith with a wayward ball to Edrick Lee in extra time, a disappointed Bradman Best spent much of last week practicing one-on-one passing with the Knights winger.
articles.content:

articles.title: Premier League teams gear up for season restart with behind-closed-doors friendlies - ABC News
articles.description: Manchester United, Chelsea, Arsenal and Liverpool among clubs that have stepped up their season-restart plans by playing friendly matches behind closed doors.
articles.content:
The English Premier League is set to resume on Wednesday June 17, and teams have stepped up their preparations with in-house matches over the weekend.

articles.title: Star revolt is the UFC nightmare that’s been brewing for years - Fox Sports
articles.description: The UFC is back in business and so is Dana White, waging the war from the front and spearheading its return - the first of any major U.S. sporting event since the coronavirus shutdown.
articles.content:
But now White is facing an even greater challenge from within.
His biggest stars are revolting. Conor McGregor has just announced he is retiring again, Henry Cejudo called it quits after beating Dom… [+5944 chars]

articles.title: People only care about Indigenous deaths 'if there's a white perpetrator': Jacinta Price - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
Alice Springs Councillor Jacinta Price has told Sky News of the “reality of the circumstances” occurring in remote communities which the weekend’s Black Lives Matter protesters “care zero for”.

Ms Price said watching the footage of the protesters and the con…
